subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: RCA 12-470 RADIO SHACK HACK FILES
author: Lisby
full_text:
Frank, you have just terribly upset me by mentioning Harmony. Now all  
possibility of Harmony is off the table. I'm calling the Forces of  
Darkness to serve you a false communication burger with extra cheese.

I really gotta know who this is now.

Ann



On Nov 27, 2007, at 2:56 PM, Frank Sumption wrote:

> Charli says her guys say now that this new easy method is  
> available, the ETs will start to interact more.
>
>  See coffeepotghost.com
>
>  This is the whole point I was trying to make, all you need is  
> something for them to form a voice with, and there wil be no  
> shortage of entites that want to talk.
>
>  I had bit of temper yesteraday, as a long time researcher accused  
> all of us of getting "false communication". Maybe I'm in bitch  
> mode, but that crap really pisses me off. Who the hell is this one  
> guy to assume everything he gets is gospel truth(that no one else  
> can hear), while we get nothing. Still trying to calm myself so as  
> not to upset the "harmony".
>
>  Well done everyone!!
>
>  Frank-S
>
>
>
>

> > >

> TWO

> AND

> FROM

> A
> > > MINUTE TO LISTEN AND POST YOUR FEEDBACK.
> > >
> > > THE FILES ARE POSTED IN THE FILE SECTION UNDER:
> > >
> > > 11-26-07_radio shack hack files_Bruce
> > >
> > > AFTER DOING ONLY ONE RECORDED SESSION AND TWO SESSIONS TOTAL. I
> AS A
> > > SERIOUS BOX RESEARCHER WITH EVRYDAY EXPERIMENTING ON
> FRANK'S,JOE'S
> > > AND NOW THE RADIO SHACK HACK BOX CAN PREMATURELY SAY THAT THIS
> RADIO
> > > MAY BE SMALL IN SIZE BUT IT PACKS A BIG PUNCH ! AND IT WAS UNDER
> OUR
> > > VERY NOSES ALL THE TIME. THANKS TO SUM DUC FOR HIS INSIGHT IN
> > > DISCOVERING IT.
> > >
> > > AT THE RISK OF SOUNDING REDUNDENT I MUST REITERATE THIS RS BOX
> WILL
> > > HOLD IT'S OWN WITH THE BIG BOYS. THE RESULTS AND LEVEL OF
> > > COMMUNICATION BOTH IN REAL TIME DURING A SESSION AND WHAT IS
> MISSED
> > > BY OUR RUDIMENTARY HUMAN HEARING AND CAUGHT ON A RECORDING RIVALS
> OR
> > > MAY EVEN GIVEN ENOUGH TIME FOR FREQUENCY IMPRINTING BY OUR SPIRIT
> > > FRIENDS AND PROPER RESEARCH METHODS WILL SURPASS JOE'S BOX AND
> PULL A
> > > CLOSE SECOND TO FRANK'S BOX.
> > >
> > > AS A MATTER OF FACT MY FIRST IMPRESSION OF THE RS BOX WAS
> REMINICENT
> > > OF THE AM LINEAR MODE OF MY FRANKS BOX #12. LET'S FACE IT A
> FRANKS
> > > BOX IS A FRANKS BOX IN AS NO TWO ARE EXACTLY THE SAME THAT IS
> WHAT
> > > MAKES THEM SO UNIQUE AND ALSO THE FACT THAT I BELIEVE A SMALL
> PART OF
> > > FRANK HIMSELF TRANSFERS INTO EVERY BOX HE MAKES AND HE IS VERY
> WELL
> > > RESPECTED ON THE OTHER SIDE FROM WHAT MY GUIDES AND TECHS TELL ME.
> > >
> > > I HAVE NOT HAD THE OPPORTUNITY TO USE RON RICKETS MINI BOX YET
> BUT I
> > > AM HEARING VERY GOOD THINGS ABOUT IT'S PERFORMANCE ALSO AND CAN
> NOT
> > > WAIT TO EXPERIMENT WITH IT.
> > >
> > > I THINK OUR FRIENDS ON THE OTHER SIDE ARE FINALY DECIDING TO PUSH
> > > FORWARD WITH THE COMMUNICATION PROCESS AND ALLOW IT TO BECOME
> > > ACCESABLE TO MANY MORE PEOPLE. WHAT THEY HAVE CONVEYED TO ME OVER
> > > NUMEROUS SESSIONS IS THE DESPERATE AND INTRIGAL NEED FOR COMBINED
> > > HARMONY AMONG RESEARCHERS AND COMMUNICATORS. THE MORE MINDS THAT
> ARE
> > > THINKING AND MOVING TOGETHER FOR THIS COMMON GOAL THE STRONGER
> THE
> > > SPIRITS ABILITY TO COMMUNICATE AND THEY WILL HELP WITH DEVELOPE
> MENT
> > > OF THE TECHNOLOGY SO THINGS ARE LOOKING UP AND HEADING TO THE
> FUTURE.
> > >
> > > WHAT I HAVE GATHERED OVER MANY SESSIONS IS THEY DEFINATELY WANT
> THE
> > > WORD AND THE TECHNOLOGY SPREAD TO AS MANY AS ARE WILLING TO
> ACCEPT IT
> > > WITH AN OPEN MIND. I AM RATTLING ON AND HAVE DRIFTED FROM MY
> ORIGINAL
> > > POINT WHICH WAS, THIS RADIO SHACK BOX IS AND WILL BE A VERY
> IMPORTANT
> > > AND USEFULL TOOL IN FURTHERING OUR COMMUNICATION PROCESS.
> > >
> > > THANKS FOR LISTENING.
> > >
> > > BRUCE
> > >
> >
>
>
